name: states_list
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool city_and_state_search_api.
Tool description: A easy-to-use API for search cities, states, and countries from around the world.
API description: This endpoint returns a list of States .It returns basic information about each state, such as name, code, and country. You can also use this endpoint to retrieve a list of states filtered by various criteria such as country.

country_id.description: The ID of the country to filter states by.

sortorder.description: The order in which to sort the results. Can be 'asc' for ascending or 'desc' for descending.

sortby.description: The field by which to sort the results (e.g., 'name', 'code').

limit.description: The maximum number of results to retrieve.

country_code.description: The code of the country to filter states by. Defaults to 'IN'.

country_name.description: The name of the country to filter states by.
